name: 【SPAP #34】未來浮影｜Future's Mirage
description:
※ 標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)。

※ Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)。

－

【夢境故事】

我來到了未來，陽光明媚照亮一條調高架的馬路，底下房子林立，城鎮和山脈交匯。漫步在馬路上，看見行人熙熙攘攘，但車子卻不見了蹤影。我意識到，未來的車子不再在道路上行駛，而是在天空中飛翔。



遠處的一座壯觀玻璃大廈吸引了我的目光，它高聳入雲，頂端是兩個美麗的花圃和泳池。我感覺未來的我就在那座大廈中，擁有著高貴的地位。我望著大廈，不禁想起一句詩：「翩翩仙子舞碧空，遨遊雲端浮世中。」這種夢幻般的景象，讓我感到深深的震撼和感動。

－

【Dream Story】

I arrived in the future, where the bright sunshine illuminated a high elevated highway. Underneath the highway were rows of houses, while the city and mountains met at the border. As I strolled along the road, I saw bustling pedestrians, but no trace of cars. It dawned on me that in the future, cars no longer traveled on the road, but flew in the sky.



In the distance, a magnificent glass building caught my eye. It towered into the clouds, with two beautiful gardens and pools on its rooftop. I felt that the future me was inside that building, possessing a noble status. As I gazed at the building, a poetic phrase came to mind: "The fairy dances in the blue sky, wandering in the floating world." The dreamlike scenery filled me with deep awe and emotion.
